title: Singing/Songwriting
description: I don't do it as much anymore but I enjoy making music. It's a nice creative outlet. The summer after highschool I partnered with one of my best friends to release an EP. You can listen to it [here](https://open.spotify.com/album/2P0seLvlDpH3dXxMXcPQlH?si=mgfBkcMDQ5-y67MNQ21ISQ).

title: Jewelry Making
description: Pre AI Taught myself how to make pretty complex jewelry online. Back when I was in China you could literally order anything online. I practically had a jewelry making studio in the living room. I now have random understanding of annealing metals, soldering, and pickling things like 925 silver.

title: Film Photography
description: There's something special in capturing the moment and not worrying about how the photos look. Moments are captured as is, and I like that. How authentic are pictures when they're retaken because your hair looked bad or you weren't smiling enough?
